comments.body:
`tsconfig.json` is wrong, should be similar to:

```json
{ 
    "compilerOptions": { 
        "module": "commonjs", 
        "lib": [ 
            "es6", 
            "dom" 
        ], 
        "noImplicitAny": true, 
        "noImplicitThis": true, 
        "strictNullChecks": true, 
        "baseUrl": "../", 
        "typeRoots": [ 
            "../" 
        ], 
        "types": [], 
        "noEmit": true, 
        "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true 
    }, 
    "files": [ 
        "index.d.ts", 
        "bloomfilter-tests.ts"
        ] 
}
```
